title: 1 Bed in N Berkeley, Great Neighborhood, walkable to campus and BART
posting_body: ['1920 Francisco St is on a quiet, tree-lined street in an incredibly accessible neighborhood just north of downtown Berkeley.', 'Walkable to UC Berkeley Campus, BART, downtown shops and restaurants, and world-famous North Berkeley eateries, this location is great for graduate and independent students as well as those seeking to experience the best that Berkeley has to offer while having access to the rest of the Bay Area.', 'Amenities include laundry in the building, roof deck, private balconies, intercom delivery system, fiber-optic internet hookups (service not included), and available garage parking.', 'We also have units on the South side of the UC Berkeley campus.', 'Visit our website for more info on those: <URL>/', 'For all units: security deposit is 1.5x the monthly rent; utilities not included; units are unfurnished; no smoking and no pets.', 'Looking for 1 year lease, but are flexible.', 'All prices are negotiable.', 'Email or call with some details about yourself for more information.', 'Have a wonderful day!']
